Training_Credit_MappingObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Training_Credit_MappingObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Training_Credit_MappingObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies the Training Credit Mapping to update. Leave blank when adding

Training_Credit_Mapping_Data.description: Reference ID for a Training Credit Mapping
Effective Date for a Training Credit Mapping

validation.validation: Select an effective date that is in the future.
This date is already in use by a Training Credit Mapping. Please select an unused future date.
You can only edit a Training Credit Mapping with an effective date that is in the future.

CurrencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CurrencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: Select a currency that isn't already in use.

description: Contains detailed information about a Training Credit Mapping. Training Credit Currency Mapping Row Data will follow the "flush and fill" policy: all existing rows will be replaced by the data in the request.
